data.name: RPG Sounds - Stadium Massacre - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Stadium Massacre is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • 2 Minute Warning
  • Fumble
  • Ready For Kick-Off

SFX
  • Audience Reactions (3)
  • Human Pain Grunt (8)
  • Human Touchdown
  • Orc Audience Reactions (4)
  • Orc Pain Grunt (8)
  • Orc Touchdown
  • Sports Tackle (4)
  • Sports Whistle (4)

data.short_description: Stadium Massacre is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
